description: Manage PostgreSQL flexible server private endpoint connections.

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server private-endpoint-connection approve
commands.summary: Approve the specified private endpoint connection associated with a PostgreSQL flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server private-endpoint-connection approve -g testgroup -s testsvr         -n pec-connection.40e3d3a8-7d8f-41eb-8462-1cd05bc3e33b         --description "Approve connection"

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server private-endpoint-connection delete
commands.summary: Delete the specified private endpoint connection associated with a PostgreSQL flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server private-endpoint-connection delete -g testgroup -s testsvr         --id /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/testgroup/providers/Microsoft.DBforPostgreSQL/flexibleServers/testsvr/privateEndpointConnections/pec-connection.40e3d3a8-7d8f-41eb-8462-1cd05bc3e33b

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server private-endpoint-connection list
commands.summary: List all private endpoint connections associated with a PostgreSQL flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server private-endpoint-connection list -g testgroup -s testsvr

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server private-endpoint-connection reject
commands.summary: Reject the specified private endpoint connection associated with a PostgreSQL flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server private-endpoint-connection reject -g testgroup -s testsvr         -n pec-connection.40e3d3a8-7d8f-41eb-8462-1cd05bc3e33b         --description "Reject connection"

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server private-endpoint-connection show
commands.summary: Show details of a private endpoint connection associated with a PostgreSQL flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server private-endpoint-connection show -g testgroup -s testsvr -n pec-connection.40e3d3a8-7d8f-41eb-8462-1cd05bc3e33b
